website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a Pusheen doll to fit the Christmas season, the small size of this option may not matter to you.
pros: With her red and green Christmas tree sweeter, this little Pusheen doll has become a holiday favorite among followers
Comes with a Christmas greeting card
cons: At 4.5 inches, she is smaller than others we considered

customer_reviews.title: Gund Holiday Sweater Pusheen
customer_reviews.text: This Pusheen plush is 5 1/2 x 5 x 3 inches and is wearing a sewn-on red, green and white Christmas sweater. A cute holiday version of the adorable cat. A good size to use as a stocking stuffer or small gift. There is a nylon hook used for retail display on the top of the soft plush and normally it would be promptly removed, but if desired can be used to hang the festive cat on the tree.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Adooooooore
customer_reviews.text: I loved it! It’s so cute and soft. I adore the design and so did my friend when I gave it to her as a Christmas gift. I definitely recommend getting this for yourself or a friend. I kinda wish I kept it now. 😂
customer_reviews.author: MadHatter239

customer_reviews.title: Love this new sweater Pusheen
customer_reviews.text: Love this new sweater Pusheen, one of my favorites , highly recommend it for you or your loved ones !!!
customer_reviews.author: NinjaSpider

customer_reviews.title: Pusheen Christmas!
customer_reviews.text: My best friend loves Pusheen, I like to get her a little collection of Pusheen things for Christmas. Usually includes a calender and a plushy. I couldn't afford a large one this year so I got her this little one. She cried when she saw his grumpy face sticking out of her stocking.
customer_reviews.author: Kales121

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Pusheen Tree!
customer_reviews.text: I love the angry Pusheen face! Perfect for my Pusheen Tree!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Pulido

customer_reviews.title: Pusheen Holiday Sweater Animal
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made, so adorable. My granddaughter will be happy with this present at Christmas
customer_reviews.author: diana presing

customer_reviews.title: Angry SweaterSheen knows, it's the most wonderful time, of the year!
customer_reviews.text: I was never that into Angry SweaterSheen, but, after some thought, I finally got her. She is freaking adorable. She is fun to put into pictures, as she embodies the true spirit of Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Tig

customer_reviews.title: Adorably angry!
customer_reviews.text: What's not to love about Gund, an ugly Christmas sweater, and an angry little Pusheen? This is an adorable plush and by far my favorite amongst the other winter holiday Pusheens.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Christmas gift for my sister and she loved it. It was everything I expected
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Gallik

customer_reviews.title: Soft and adorable! She stands angrily at my desk bringing holiday ...
customer_reviews.text: Soft and adorable! She stands angrily at my desk bringing holiday joy. I would have given 5 stars, but there were some imperfections in the stitching of her face.
customer_reviews.author: Inedible Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Christmas Pusheen!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of many Christmas Pusheen's that I have added to my collection for Christmas decorating, like the others he is adorable and festive in his holiday sweater, very happy with this purchase!

customer_reviews.title: and she LOVED it

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing!! My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing!! My daughter loves it!! She is giving it for a white elephant gift and she does not was to give it away!!! I highly suggest to buy it. It is a real pusheen for a great price. A definite buy!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for the Pusheen Lover in your Life
customer_reviews.text: It is incredibly cute, I bought it as a gift and it is loved. It is a bit smaller than expected, but I believe that is noted and I just missed it, but note that is about the size of an small adult hand.

customer_reviews.title: So cute.

customer_reviews.title: Things your cat wants for Christmas:
customer_reviews.text: Came missing her right set of whiskers, but otherwise is a 5 star product. She sits up so well and looks cute nestled in various spots to add that little bit of Christmas fun that only someone that's attempted to put a sweater on a cat can enjoy!

customer_reviews.title: If you love Grumpy Pusheens, you'll adore her.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter absolutely loved this holiday Pusheen toy

customer_reviews.title: Love her little mad face & looks like she is ...
customer_reviews.text: So cute!! Love her little mad face & looks like she is trying to shed that sweater off! I want to keep her up year round!!

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived damage with one of the legs separated from the body.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it was a gift for my daughter and she loved it
customer_reviews.author: Maria Luciano

customer_reviews.title: Beware of cat!
customer_reviews.text: Ever wonder if cats like to be dressed? One look at Pusheen in a Christmas sweater and you'll know the answer. A bite of humor to cut the sugary taste of some holiday items.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Coble

customer_reviews.title: Dont by this product
customer_reviews.text: Well I got this and was really exited to open it because it was a secret Santa gift. About a half an hour later my hand went numb. And then my face did. And I was having a hard time breathing. I had a chemical reaction to it. And the doctor told me it was because of the chemical they put into it to help it smell better. Would never recommend this product, it caused me and my family one of the scariest nights we have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Devin

product_meta.title: GUND Pusheen Sweater Holiday Stuffed Animal Cat Plush, 4.5"
product_meta.description: GUND is proud to present Pusheen — a chubby gray tabby cat that loves cuddles, snacks, and dress-up. As a popular web comic, Pusheen brings brightness and chuckles to millions of followers in her rapidly growing online fan base. This 4.5” Pusheen holiday plush is ready to celebrate the season with a festive Christmas sweater and greeting card. Surface-washable for easy cleaning. Appropriate for ages one and up. About GUND: For more than 100 years, GUND has been a premier plush company recognized worldwide for quality innovative products. Building upon our award-winning and beloved plush designs, we continue to practice innovation by constantly developing new original and licensed designs to appeal to the next generation of customers. To that end, each one of our plush toys is constructed from premium materials for unparalleled softness and huggability.
feature_bullets: Pusheen plush toy in classic pose brings adorable web comic to life.
Features festive red & green christmas sweater and greeting card.
Made from soft, huggable material that meets famous gund quality standards.
